item.description:
The DrumConnection

About this Meetup Group

Meet other local Hand-Drummers who are interested creating community through the rich history of Africa and it's people. Drum Circles are a great way to stay connected to our inner rhythms.

By going to our DrumConnection Website, you will get specific directions. We can be hard to find and you can't hear us either as we are soundproofed! But if you find 50 Tufts Street, Alington (not too hard, right?) then we'll see your happy faces on Friday. Please ONLY enter the building at the DRUM CIRCLE sign OR you will not hear, see or find us!

My cell # is good to have if you get lost. Take it with you: Alan: 617-686-6080

Directions:DrumConnection DrumRoom

item.name: Friday Nite Drum Circle with The DrumConnection - Arlington/Cambridge
